attributes.review: First of all the app took so long to download. it took about 4 days which is really disappointing because i want to support my wonderful president. Anyway, when i first opened the app it asked for my phone number and i put in my phone number. As soon as i pressed continue, i started receiving messages. The app was spamming me with link and messages. 1 star rating..so disappointing😞
attributes.title: DANGEROUS DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: As some of the review said, it took almost awhile to fully download(about 2 to 3 days). Next, it took most of my gigabytes which caused my phone to glitch. Third, the app platform was very confusing, I had now Idea how to buy or donate. This is one of the most horrible app I’ve downloaded and I think it shouldn’t be on the App Store!! Please do something about this thank you.😁
attributes.title: Horrible🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this hoping to get some much needed information about the republican platform in the USA. Sadly the app glitches(randomly shuts out) and is now sending me intimidating notifications that the orange man wants to meet me, and that I have been chosen to be in his inner circle.... would not recommend unless you are a fan of pyramid schemes or intimidating and mysterious texts from unknown numbers ( I am not a fan)
attributes.title: Strange orange man???

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this awful app, everything was going okay. Then the fbi rolled up to my house and I was wondering why when I realized the app was AGE RESTRICTED! And I am 2 years old on the date! So I ran away by digging a hole that the Cheeto himself would not be able to fit into. Then I remembered that you can’t dig straight down! So I tragically died in an underground cave as heath care was too expensive 😔
attributes.title: Inconvenient

attributes.review: I just want to start off by saying this app took forever to download. It literally hacked my phone and I don’t know what to do . When I finally got into the app it has creepy info up there and it even showed all my information . Please do not get this app because it will mess up your phone and share all your personal info . Please stay safe . 🧚🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: Never again 🤦🏾‍♀️

attributes.review: I tried to download this app and it took hours. My phone has been crashing ever since. I wanted to stay up to date on the campaign - that’s all. Once I opened the app I noticed some crazy things. My camera would start turning on at random times. I started getting very specific messages. I don’t like it. It doesn’t feel safe. Deleting!
attributes.title: Is my data safe???

attributes.review: This app is so bad it kept kicking me out every two seconds and it kept glitching over and over and over again I could barely use it! Not to mention it’s an app of a literal Cheeto... trûmp is a Cheeto and he’s our president??? I can’t even begin to describe how much hatred I have for that “man” AND HES SO UGLY HAHHAHAHAHAHAHA HE LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE ROLLED HIM IN A PILE OF CLOWN MAKEUP THEN TRIED TO COVER IT UP WITH ORANGE FOUNDATION HHAHAHAHAHAHA BUT WE CAN ALL STILL SEE THE CLOWN!!! Anyways if u vote for him you deserve to die immediately<3 anyways love gen z 🧚🏻‍♂️🌸💗✨🌈😼
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it asked me for my phone number. This only meant that they would steal this information to spam my number with election messages for Trump. The app also keeps crashing and ive tried everything possible way to fix it but I realized it was the apps doing. No wonder it’s only a 1.2 star app. It really shows.
attributes.title: Stealing Information/Crashing

attributes.review: So, I have been looking around the app store trying to see what kind of apps I can play, ad then came across the Donald Trump App. I was skeptical at first, but I had nothing good to do anyway, so I downloaded the app. As soon ad I opened the app, I kept on getting these weird glitches on my screen, event though my phone is brand new. I haven’t touched the app since and don’t plan on anytime soon.
attributes.title: Wow. Just wow.

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to make sure i was kept up to date with our wonderful president 😜😜 but after downloading it i couldn't exit out of the app. i powered off my phone but BOOM.... it still showed up. this app is haunted, i cant even delete it!!!! the only way i can exit out of the app is if you delete it off the app store. hope you understand
attributes.title: phone crashes
